nodes.text: Hail Twelve was the callsign assigned to the twelveth pilot of the New Republic's Hail Squadron. During the Galactic Civil War, a Y-wing pilot was designated this callsign during a battle with the 204th Imperial Fighter Wing, but was later killed at the Battle of Jakku.
Hail Twelve first appeared in the 2021 novel Victory's Price, written by Alexander Freed.
